channel.title: msmtp on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in msmtp on Ian Wootten

item.title: How to Switch Your VPS in 2 Hours
item.description: Friday last week I woke up to a barrage of emails coming into my inbox. All of these were coming from notification of spam comments upon this very blog. By the time I’d woken up I’d had something like 75 emails. This was pretty strange given that Akismet was there guarding my blog ever since it’s been available and I’d never had a email about a dodgy comment since I’d set it up (something like 5 years ago).
